name: DoDreamChain
description: DRM tokens are value transmission means used in DoDream Chain and are the basic units that operate by smart contracts. Users can use a variety of services provided through DoDream Chain, such as matching, inquiry, and purchase, as DRM tokens. Users of various nationalities can trade between individuals without remittance or exchange fees.
